subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Fifth-seeded Butler advances to the title game with a 52-50 win. Butler could be the lowest seed to win a national title since Kansas did it as a No. 6 seed in 1988.
snippet: Fifth-seeded Butler advances to the title game with a 52-50 win. Butler could be the lowest seed to win a national title since Kansas did it as a No. 6 seed in 1988.
